channel.title: Making mod/admin and others
channel.description:
i have server, it's online, but if i chance player-rights to 3, and startup my server, NOTHING, it's not helping. Same with the other things, if i chance java.client, save, i startup my server, NOTHING AGAIN. the old settings! Please help me. btw i'm using testscape.
Sorry for bad english, i'm dutch.
~Baloeh[br][size=1]Posted at: December 10, 2006, 08:39:43 AM[/size][hr]help me please

item.title: Making mod/admin and others
item.dc:creator: @baloeh baloeh
item.description:
@baloeh wrote:

ooh now i see the problem! i can’t compile!

Help please!

Read full topic

item.title: Making mod/admin and others
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

open client.java and search for //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
under it should be something like this only with a different name than steve

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("steve")) { playerRights = 3; }
change that name to your username and close and compile
then it should work

Read full topic

i am REALLY 100% sure. I did it like 100 times lol.

item.title: Making mod/admin and others

item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

ok go into the character folder and change the player rights from there
make sure u save before u close it
